delete.description:
Professor can only delete lectures if he is a course owner. An admin can only delete lectures of a course of the faculty they manage. Super admin can delete course lectures of all faculties.

Note: all related audio recordings, transcripts, translations, bookmarks and attachments are deleted.

403.description: User has insufficient rights.

patch.summary: Change status of the lecture (published/hidden and finished).
patch.description:
Lecturer / course leader can change status for his own courses, admin can change status for all lectures of courses which belong to the same faculty as he. 

Device can change status of lecture to finished.

patch.description: Lecturer / course leader can modify lectures of own courses, admin can modify lectures of courses which belong to the same faculty as he.

get.summary: Get a specific lecturer.

delete.description:
All related content (for ex.: lecturer's bookmarks and user activity) will also get deleted. 

An admin can only delete a lecturer of the faculty they manage. Super admin can delete lecturers of all faculties. 

Note: only lecturers which have no related courses can be deleted.

get.summary: Get a list of available STT domains.
Get a paginated list of lectures.
get.description:
Students can't see unpublished lectures. Lecturer and course leader can see related unpublished lectures. Admin can see all lectures of faculty they manage. Super admin can see all lectures. 

To filter out lectures of specific course, use query parameter `course.code`. To filter out lectures of specific lecturer, use query parameter `lecturer.fullName`. To filter out lectures of specific faculty, use query parameter `course.faculty.code`. To filter out lectures of specific classroom, use query parameter `classroom.code`. Please check query parameters to see all available filtering options. 

Sorting is available for `startTime`, `endTime`, `lecturer.fullName`, `course.faculty.code`, for ex.: add query parameter `sort=course.faculty.code,desc`to sort by course's faculty code ascending. 

Note: `classroom` can be null.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by faculty, classroom, course or lecturer.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size of the page to be returned

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property,(asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

400.description: Provided field for sorting doesn't exist.

get.summary: Get list of translations for specific lecture.
get.description: Check query parameters for filtering options. Translations of hidden lectures are shown only to lecturer / course leader and admin of the same faculty.

parameters.name: start-offset-from
parameters.description: Only translations which starts after provided time.

parameters.name: start-offset-to
parameters.description: Only translations which starts before provided time.

get.summary: Get a list of lecture transcripts.
get.description: Transcripts of hidden lectures are shown only to lecturer / course leader and admin.

parameters.name: start-offset-from
parameters.description: Only transcripts which starts after provided time.

parameters.name: start-offset-to
parameters.description: Only transcripts which starts before provided time.

get.summary: Get a list of transcripts and related translations for specific lecture.
get.description: Check query parameters for filtering options. Translations of hidden lectures are shown only to lecturer / course leader and admin of the same faculty.

parameters.name: start-offset-from
parameters.description: Only transcripts and related translations which starts after provided time.

parameters.name: start-offset-to
parameters.description: Only transcripts and related translations which starts before provided time.

get.summary: Get a list of transcripts and related translations for specific lecture.
get.description: Check query parameters for filtering options.

Download all lecture attachments as archive.

get.summary: Get a paginated list of lectures for the professor view.
get.description: This is an endpoint meant to be used exclusively by lecturers.It returns a personalized view of lectures for the professor.These lectures include all lectures of the courses the professor is teaching.It also includes all other lectures he has access (lectures which he has orated but are not in his courses).The ID of the professor is extracted from the access token.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by faculty, classroom, course or lecturer.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size of the page to be returned

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property,(asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

400.description: Provided field for sorting doesn't exist.

get.summary: Get a paginated list of lecturers.
get.description:
To filter out lecturers of specific faculty, use query parameter `faculty.code`. To filter out lecturers by full name, use query parameter `fullName`. 

Sorting is available for `fullName`, `faculty.code`, for ex.: add query parameter `sort=faculty.code,asc`to sort by lecturer's faculty code ascending.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size of the page to be returned

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property,(asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

400.description: Invalid format of provided query parameters.

get.summary: Get a list of available languages.
Get a paginated list of faculties.
get.description:
To search faculties by code or name, use `search` query parameter. 

Sorting is available for faculty `code` and `name` for ex.: add query parameter `sort=code,asc`to sort by faculty code ascending.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by faculty's code or name.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size of the page to be returned

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property,(asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

400.description: Invalid format of provided query parameters.

get.summary: Get a specific faculty.
Get closest lecture for logged-in lecturer.
get.description:
The closest lecture is the one with its start time closest to the current time. It can be in the past or in the future. 

Available only for authenticated users with role `PROFESSOR` or `DEVICE`.

403.description: User's role is not 'PROFESSOR' or 'DEVICE'.

get.summary: Get a paginated list of courses.
get.description:
To filter out courses of specific faculty, use query parameter `faculty.code`. To filter out courses of specific course leader, use query parameter `courseLeader.fullName`. 

Sorting is available for `code`, `name`, `courseLeader.fullName`, `faculty.code`, for ex.: add query parameter `sort=faculty.code,asc`to sort by course's faculty code ascending.

To leave out courses to which student is already subscriber use a query parameter `excludeSubscriptions`.

parameters.name: faculty.codes
parameters.description: Faculty codes. If none is specified, return all.

parameters.name: filterSubscriptions
parameters.description: Filter by student's subscriptions. If none is specified, return all.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size of the page to be returned

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property,(asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

400.description: Invalid format of provided query parameters.

get.summary: Get all courses subscriptions for currently-logged in user.
get.description: Currently available only for user role `STUDENT`.

403.description: User is not `STUDENT`.

get.summary: Basic information about current ON backend deploy.
get.description: Backend's name, version and build time.

200.description: Backend's name, version and build time.

get.summary: Get a (filtered) list of classrooms.
get.description:
To filter out classrooms by its code name provide query parameter `code`. To filter out classrooms of specific faculty, use query parameter `faculty.code`. 

Sorting is available for classroom's `code` and `faculty.code`, for ex.: add query parameter `sort=faculty.code,asc`to sort by classroom's faculty code ascending.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size of the page to be returned

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property,(asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

400.description: Invalid format of provided query parameters.

An admin can only delete lectures of a lecturer of the faculty they manage. Super admin can delete lecturer's lectures of all faculties.

Note: all related audio recordings, transcripts, translations, bookmarks and attachments are deleted.

An admin can only delete courses of a lecturer of the faculty they manage. Super admin can delete lecturer's courses of all faculties.

Note: All courses should have no related lectures.

isRegular.title: isRegular
isRegular.description: 'true' for regular lectures, 'false' for special lectures.

PinAuthRequest.description: User credentials which are sent during authentication request.

hasSubscriptions.title: hasSubscriptions
hasSubscriptions.description: User's has subscriptions (means that the user is already onboarded as he has subscription).

AuthResponse.description: User's role, faculty's code and JWT access token for successfully authenticated user.

UsernamePasswordAuthRequest.description: User credentials which are sent during authentication request.

isRegular.title: isRegular
isRegular.description: 'true' for regular lectures, 'false' for special lectures.

recreateFromTranscript.title: recreateFromTranscript
recreateFromTranscript.description: If true then translation will be recreated from the transcript stored in database. If false then translation will be updated with given content.

content.title: content
content.description: Content with which the translation will be patched. Cen only be present when 'recreateFromTranscript' field is set to false.

buildDate.title: build date
buildDate.description: Datetime when current backend was built.

faculty.title: Faculty
faculty.description: The faculty to which classroom belongs. Only available for super admin.
